title: Watch: Guthrie Govan Delivers Mind-Bending Solo While Drinking A Glass Of Water [News]
text: 10 comments sorted by best / new / date Post a comment I would literally drown myself when trying this 19 Reminds me of the Vinnie Colaiuta Sushi incident. In case you've not heard of it, here it is, as told by Steve Vai - http://www.vinniecolaiuta.com/Interviews/DrumM... 2 Not that amazing considering he has a hairband on the first fret. The guitar basically becomes a keyboard that way. 7 A hairband is only used to stop sympathetic ringing from other strings, it can't cover up sloppy technique or legato. If you make a mistake or hit an open string, you'll hear it and won't sound nice. 7 His legato tech is so sloppy 10 Congrats on the "most untrue comment of 2017" award. 0 Kevätuhri [em] 190 · 6 hours ago · permalink · ↑ reply obvious troll is obvious
